scripts.netlify-build: ROLLUP_SKIP_NODEJS=true npm install --legacy-peer-deps && mkdir -p dist && ROLLUP_SKIP_NODEJS=true astro build --verbose && cp public/_redirects dist/ && (test -f dist/404/index.html && cp dist/404/index.html dist/404.html || true) && (test -f public/500.html && cp public/500.html dist/ || true) && (npm run validate || echo 'Validation skipped during build')
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp public/_redirects dist/ && (test -f dist/404/index.html && cp dist/404/index.html dist/404.html || true) && (test -f public/500.html && cp public/500.html dist/ || true) && npm run validate && netlify deploy --prod
